data.message: My hero <3 u make elevating n inspiration n motivational music plus stuff that u can relate to cause I have my ups n downs with bipolar so I'm always changing from one mood happy n sad etc n there's always a song of urs that I know which is all of them just relate to em when experiencing the different pains m emotions thanx for helpin me through so really tough times u mean the world to me I'd be lost without you <3
